metadata.title: CVE-2023-26930 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in XPDF v.4.04 allows anattacker to cause a Denial of Service via the PDFDoc malloc in thepdftotext.cc function. NOTE: Vendor states “it's an expected abort onout-of-memory error.”

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
